00054 
00055 DomainBase *TREX::europa::details::trex_domain(EUROPA::Domain const &dom) {
00056   EUROPA::DataTypeId const &type(dom.getDataType());
00057   std::auto_ptr<DomainBase> result;
00058 
00059   // There should be a less hard-coded way to do it ...
00060   // this current implementation is not really open to the addition of
00061   // new types
00062   if( type->isBool() ) {
00063     // boolean 
00064     if( dom.isSingleton() )
00065       result.reset(new BooleanDomain(0.0!=dom.getSingletonValue()));
00066     else
00067       result.reset(new BooleanDomain());
00068   } else if( type->isNumeric() ) {
00069     EUROPA::edouble e_lb, e_ub;
00070     
00071     if( dom.isSingleton() ) {
00072       // We need to handle specifically singletons as in europa some singletons 
00073       // do not have the same lower bound and upper bound (if the lower bound is
00074       // close enough to the upper bound europa mark it as a singleton)
00075       e_lb = e_ub = dom.getSingletonValue();
00076     } else 
00077       dom.getBounds(e_lb, e_ub);
00078     
00079     if( 1.0==type->minDelta() ) {
00080       // integer
00081       EUROPA::eint i_lb(e_lb), i_ub(e_ub);
00082       IntegerDomain::bound t_lb = IntegerDomain::minus_inf,
00083        t_ub = IntegerDomain::plus_inf;
00084 
00085       // Assign the bounds only if they are not infinity
00086       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::minus_infinity()<i_lb )
00087        t_lb = EUROPA::cast_basis(i_lb);
00088       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::infinity()>i_ub )
00089        t_ub = EUROPA::cast_basis(i_ub);
00090       result.reset(new IntegerDomain(t_lb, t_ub));
00091     } else {
00092       // should be float 
00093       FloatDomain::bound t_lb = FloatDomain::minus_inf,
00094        t_ub = FloatDomain::plus_inf;
00095 
00096       // Assign the bounds only if they are not infinity
00097       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::edouble>::minus_infinity()<e_lb )
00098        t_lb = EUROPA::cast_basis(e_lb);
00099       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::edouble>::infinity()>e_ub )
00100        t_ub = EUROPA::cast_basis(e_ub);
00101       result.reset(new FloatDomain(t_lb, t_ub));
00102     }
00103   } else {
00104     // It should be an enumerated domain 
00105     std::list<EUROPA::edouble> values;
00106     BasicEnumerated *tmp = NULL;
00107     
00108     if( type->isString() ) {
00109       // A bag of strings
00110       tmp = new StringDomain();
00111     } else if( type->isEntity() ) {
00112       // A set of europa objects
00113       tmp = new EuropaEntity();
00114     } else if( type->isSymbolic() ) {
00115       // A set of symbols/an enum
00116       tmp = new EnumDomain();
00117     } else {
00118       // don't know what it is
00119       throw EuropaException("Don't know how to convert Europa type "+
00120                          type->getName().toString()+
00121                          " to an equivalent TREX domain.");
00122     }
00123     // If I reached this point tmp should be an EnumeratedDomain
00124     result.reset(tmp);
00125     dom.getValues(values);
00126     for(std::list<EUROPA::edouble>::const_iterator i=values.begin();
00127        values.end()!=i; ++i) 
00128       tmp->addTextValue(type->toString(*i));
00129   }
00130   return result.release(); // release the resulting domain
00131 }

00135  */

00137 // manipulators
00138 
00139 void details::europa_domain::visit(BasicEnumerated const *dom) {
00140   if( m_dom->isEnumerated() ) {
00141     std::list<EUROPA::edouble> values;
00142     
00143     // convert all the values of *dom in their europa form
00144     for(size_t i=0; i<dom->getSize(); ++i) {
00145       EUROPA::edouble val = m_type->createValue(dom->getStringValue(i));
00146       
00147       if( m_dom->isMember(val) ) 
00148        // insert only the values that are already in the europa domain
00149        values.push_back(val);
00150     }
00151     if( values.empty() ) // the intersection is empty
00152       throw EmptyDomain(*dom, "Europa enumerated domain "+m_dom->toString()+
00153                      " became empty.");
00154     // Apply the intersection
00155     EUROPA::EnumeratedDomain tmp(m_type, values);
00156     m_dom->intersect(tmp);
00157   } else 
00158     throw DomainAccess(*dom, "Europa domain "+m_dom->toString()+" is not enumerated.");
00159 }
00160 
00161 void details::europa_domain::visit(BasicInterval const *dom) {
00162   if( m_dom->isInterval() ) {
00163     std::auto_ptr<EUROPA::Domain> tmp(m_dom->copy());
00164     
00165     if( m_dom->isBool() ) {
00166       // Handle the boolean special case: we assume here that the T-REX 
00167       // interval domain is convertible to double
00168       if( dom->isSingleton() ) {
00169         double val = dom->getTypedSingleton<double, true>();
00170         EUROPA::edouble eval(val!=0.0);
00171         tmp->intersect(eval, eval);
00172       } else if( !dom->isFull() ) {
00173         double lo = dom->getTypedLower<double, true>(),
00174            hi = dom->getTypedUpper<double, true>();
00175         if( lo>0.0 || hi<0.0 ) {
00176           EUROPA::eint true_val(1);
00177           tmp->intersect(true_val, true_val);
00178         }
00179       }
00180     } else {
00181       std::string lo = dom->getStringLower(), hi = dom->getStringUpper();
00182       EUROPA::edouble elo = m_type->createValue(lo),
00183         ehi = m_type->createValue(hi);
00184 
00185       tmp->intersect(elo, ehi);
00186     }
00187     if( tmp->isEmpty() )
00188       throw EmptyDomain(*dom, "Europa Interval domain "+m_dom->toString()
00189                      +" became empty.");
00190     m_dom->intersect(*tmp);
00191   } else 
00192     throw DomainAccess(*dom, "Europa domain "+m_dom->toString()+" is not an interval.");
00193 }
00194 
00195 void details::europa_domain::visit(DomainBase const *dom, bool) {
00196   Symbol const &type = dom->getTypeName();
00197 
00198   if( EuropaDomain::type_name==type ) {
00199     // EuropaDomain has a europa Domain directly available
00200     EuropaDomain const &ed = dynamic_cast<EuropaDomain const &>(*dom);
00201     
00202     if( !m_dom->intersect(ed.europaDomain()) ) 
00203       throw EmptyDomain(*dom, "EUROPA domain "+m_dom->toString()+" became empty.");    
00204   } else 
00205     // I have no way to know at this stage
00206     throw DomainAccess(*dom, "Don't know how to convert domains "+
00207                      type.str()+" for Europa.");
00208 }
